summary: Spending their summer on an exotic beach, two brothers fall for the same beautiful girl, whose charm and looks may hide more than they they bargained for.
cast: Yûjirô Ishihara|Masahiko Tsugawa|Mie Kitahara|Shinsuke Ashida|Shintarô Ishihara|Harold Conway|Eiko Higashitani|Ayuko Fujishiro|Taizô Fukami|Noriko Watari|Yôko Takeuchi|Yôko Benisawa|Hiroshi Kondô|Zenji Yamada|Atsuko Akashi|Keiko Hara|Shigeo Hayashi|Yoshihisa Kamo|Yoshirô Katô|Bonjin Kawaguchi|Kyû Kitahama|Akiyoshi Kiura|Sanpei Mine|Masami Miyaji|Mitsuko Nakamura|Masumi Okada|Zensuke Oomi|Yû Sekita|Kimio Shimazaki|Keiko Shio|Tetsu Terajima
title: Fruta loca
